channel.title: Home on taavi.wtf
channel.description: Recent content in Home on taavi.wtf

item.title: Google Code-In 2019
item.description: I participated in Google Code-In for the first time this winter. Looks like other people are starting to blog about so here’s my blog post so I do not look like a weird antisocial hermit. To be honest, I had a lot of fun participating. In the end, I completed 31 tasks and had done little under 4.5% of all completed Wikimedia tasks.

item.title: dn42
item.description: I am connected to the dn42 network, which is basically a playground for BGP and other large-scale networking techniques. These details can also be found on noc.taavi.dn42. My primary ASN is AS4242423270. My IP space is: TAAVI-NET-V4-1: 172.22.130.128/27 TAAVI-NET-V6-1: fd96:70f6:b174::/48 This network is open for peering, see details below. Sites Details for individual sites and nodes are located below, if I’ve told you something else use that instead of what this page says.

item.title: Homelab
item.description: I have a homelab that I use for playing with routing and servers. This page is a rather-work-in-progress, I’m hoping that some day it will contain more technical details about what I have running, how I do things and why.
